person.persName: Benjamin C. Allin, Jr. (Mercer County, Kentucky, dry goods merchant)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, dry goods merchant. Kentucky native. Son of Benjamin C. Allin and Susan Allin. Married to Jane Taylor Allin in Anderson County on January 21, 1858. Father of Georgia Allin. Dry goods merchant in Mercer County in 1860.
